sense.name: impaired physiological state
sense.examples: The operation should repair the patient's kidney dysfunction. He suffered for years from gastrointestinal dysfunction. The cat's bowel dysfunction was indicative of a more serious underlying cause.

sense.name: abnormal, unproductive social interaction
sense.examples: Social workers deal with a lot of family dysfunction in their work. He grew up in the dysfunction of a broken home with an alcoholic mother. His book describes what he perceives as major dysfunctions in a number of modern political institutions.
